p: In the in vitro antiplasmodial test, the EECA presented an IC 50 value of 1.21 ± 0.01 obtained from dose–response curves for the culture of P. falciparum against the W2 strain (chloroquine-resistant) and an IC 50 value of 1.10 ± 0.06 against the 3D7 strain (chloroquine-sensitive) ( Table 2). In the cytotoxicity test with the WI cell line, using the MTT colorimetric method, the EECA showed an LC 50 value of > 100. In calculating the SI based on the ratio between the toxic dose and its antimalarial activity, P. falciparum demonstrated that the EECA is a safe compound with SI values > 91 for the 3D7 strain and 83 for the strain W2 ( Table 2).
